name: Evie's Holiday Mayhem (Paladins Fan Game: 1 week challenge)
name_original: Evie's Holiday Mayhem (Paladins Fan Game: 1 week challenge)
description:
Controls:
  • WASD : Movement
  • Left Mouse Button : Shoot
  • Q : Spawn Turret
  • F : Teleport (Blink)
Objective:

Winter Holidays are under Attack  and Evie is the only one who can save this amazing season ! try to defend and stay alive for as long as you can !

Credits :

Originally called "Evie's Birthday Mayhem" but due to personal IRL issues could not post in time, so releasing it under a new name. made under a week by : @TonyArtZ4
